targets.query:
from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}" and r.functionname =~ /.*MPI.*/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"Prozess ID": r. processid}))
  |> distinct(column: "Prozess ID")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"Prozesse": r._value}))

from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "mpi_file_io_1k_updated")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["processid"] == "${ProzessID}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_name" or r["_field"] == "time_diff" or r["_field"] == "traced_filename")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_seek" or r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_write")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_diff")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "hostname", "jobname","_start", "_stop", "_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Zeit: r._value, Funktion: r.functionname }))

panels.title: Dauer einzelner Seek & Write Funktionen Prozess $ProzessID

targets.query:
from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "mpi_file_io_1k_updated")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["processid"] == "${ProzessID}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_name" or r["_field"] == "time_diff" or r["_field"] == "traced_filename")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_open" or r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_seek" or r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_write" or r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_close")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_diff")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "hostname", "jobname","_start", "_stop", "_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Zeit: r._value, Funktion: r.functionname }))
  |> group(columns: ["Funktion"]) 
  |> sum(column: "Zeit") 
  |>group()

from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "mpi_parallel_iread_export")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["processid"] == "4044" or r["processid"] == "4045" or r["processid"] == "4046" or r["processid"] == "4047")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_data_offset")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "hostname", "jobname","_start", "_stop", "_time"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_seek")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Datei: r.filename, "Prozess ID": r. processid, Offset: r._value, Funktion: r.functionname}))

from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "mpi_parallel_iread_export")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["processid"] == "4044" or r["processid"] == "4045" or r["processid"] == "4046" or r["processid"] == "4047")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_name" or r["_field"] == "time_diff" or r["_field"] == "traced_filename")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_open" or r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_seek" or r["functionname"] == "MPI_Wait" or r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_iread" or r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_close")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_diff")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "hostname", "jobname","_start", "_stop", "_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"Prozess ID": r. processid, "Zeit in ns": r._value, Funktion: r.functionname, Datei: r.filename }))
  |> group(columns: ["Funktion"])
  |> mean(column: "Zeit in ns")
  |> group()

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_open" or r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_seek" or r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_write" or r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_close")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_diff")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "hostname", "jobname","_start", "_stop", "_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Zeit: r._value, Funktion: r.functionname }))
  |> group(columns: ["Funktion"]) 
  |> sum(column: "Zeit") 
  |>group()

from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "mpi_file_io_1k_updated")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["processid"] == "10246")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_name" or r["_field"] == "time_diff" or r["_field"] == "traced_filename")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_open" or r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_seek" or r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_write" or r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_close")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_diff")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "hostname", "jobname","_start", "_stop", "_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Zeit: r._value, Funktion: r.functionname }))
  |> group(columns: ["Funktion"]) 
  |> sum(column: "Zeit") 
  |>group()

from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: 2024-05-19T07:22:25.56Z, stop: 2024-06-18T07:22:25.561Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "mpi_file_io_1k_updated")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["processid"] == "10241" or r["processid"] == "10242" or r["processid"] == "10244" or r["processid"] == "10246")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_data_written_bytes") //or r["_field"] == "function_data_written_bytes")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "hostname", "jobname", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_write")
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({r with "_value": int(v: r["_value"])}))
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "filename","functionname", "thread"])
  |> rename(columns: {_time: "Zeit", _value: "Bytes"})

from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: 2024-05-19T07:22:25.56Z, stop: 2024-06-18T07:22:25.561Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "mpi_file_io_1k_updated")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["processid"] == "10241" or r["processid"] == "10242" or r["processid"] == "10244" or r["processid"] == "10246")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_data_offset") //or r["_field"] == "function_data_written_bytes")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "hostname", "jobname", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_seek")
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({r with "_value": int(v: r["_value"])}))
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "filename","functionname", "thread"])
  |> rename(columns: {_time: "Zeit", _value: "Offset"})

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "hsebucket",
  tag: "jobname",
  predicate: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace",
  start: -100d
)
list.name: jobname

  bucket: "hsebucket",
  tag: "jobname",

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "hsebucket",
  tag: "processid",
  predicate: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace" and r["jobname"] == "${jobname}",
  start: -100d
)
